alert.note: Alert for Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:42PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Winston County through 415 PM CDT... At 342 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moreland, or 14 miles south of Moulton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moreland, Brushy Lake, Inmanfield, Upshaw and Grayson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
